trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9MessageDigest class defines the message digest of a CMS/PKCS #7 message.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9MessageDigest 클래스 CMS/PKCS #7 메시지의 메시지 다이제스트를 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: A Pkcs9MessageDigest object will be automatically generated and placed in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property whenever the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the corresponding signer is not empty.
trans-unit.target: Pkcs9MessageDigest 개체를 자동으로 생성 되며에 배치 된 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>속성 때마다는 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>해당 서명자에 대 한 속성이 비어 있지 않은.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.CmsSigner.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.SignerInfo.SignedAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The Pkcs9MessageDigest constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest"></xref> class.
This method replaces the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest> object with the specified <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> object.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 현재 대신 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest>개체를 지정 된 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData>개체입니다.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs9MessageDigest>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.AsnEncodedData"></xref> object from which to copy information.
The MessageDigest property retrieves the message digest.
trans-unit.target: MessageDigest 속성은 메시지 다이제스트를 검색 합니다.

trans-unit.source: An array of byte values that contains the message digest.
trans-unit.target: 메시지 다이제스트 포함 된 바이트 값의 배열입니다.
